org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt
Interface AutomatonOptimizer<T extends Automaton>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the automaton to be optimized
All Known Implementing Classes:
AltConnectorReducer, DelayedSimulationOptimizer, FairSimulationOptimizer, NTGBWStateReducer, PruningFairSets, RabinIndex, SimulationOptimizer, SupersetReduction, WringOptimizer
public interface AutomatonOptimizer<T extends Automaton>

An AutomatonOptimizer is an object that can simplifies an automaton without changing its language.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Summary
 void optimize(T aut)
          Simplifies a specified automaton without changing its language.
 

Method Detail

Simplifies a specified automaton without changing its language.

Parameters:
aut - an automaton to be simplified
